# WKMediaPlaybackState.paused

**Case**

The media playback is paused.

## Declaration

```swift
case paused
```

## Constants

- **WKMediaPlaybackState.none**: There is no media to play back.
- **WKMediaPlaybackState.playing**: The media is playing.
- **WKMediaPlaybackState.suspended**: The media is not playing, and cannot be resumed until the user revokes the suspension.

items.description: There is no media to play back.
items.name: WKMediaPlaybackState.none
